name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maps Leads Extractor & Bing Maps Scraper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bing Maps scraper for lead generation. Extract business data, phone numbers, and emails. One-click export to CSV/Excel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maps Leads Extractor & Bing Maps Scraper is a powerful Chrome extension designed to revolutionize your lead generation process. This powerful Bing Maps scraper tool allows you to effortlessly extract valuable business data from Bing Maps search results. Whether you're a marketer, researcher, or business owner, Maps Leads Extractor streamlines your workflow and helps you discover potential leads with ease.

âœ“ Bulk Keyword Creator: Generate extensive lists of relevant search terms to expand your lead generation scope.
